companies.name: Soul
companies.description: THC seltzers are the fizzy, cannabis-infused alternative to alcoholic drinks, offering a light, refreshing buzz without the hangover.

companies.name: Cycling Frog
companies.description: Cycling Frog THC seltzer is a wildly drinkable hard seltzer alternative. With 5mg delta 9 THC & 10mg CBD per can.

companies.name: Happi
companies.description: Happi is a collection of THC seltzers made for any occasion. All natural and low-calorie, with a low dose of THC in each can.

companies.name: Flyers
companies.description: Crafted with 5mg of hemp-derived THC, we formulated our cocktails to bring you a light sense of euphoria and relaxation.

companies.name: Drinkin' Buds
companies.description: Our classic Drinkin' Buds Cannabis Cocktails have 5mg of THC and 5mg of CBD.

companies.name: Pamos
companies.description: Pamos Spritz Cocktails are refreshing, sparkling, and infused with hemp-derived cannabis.

companies.name: WYNK
companies.description: WYNK Seltzer + THC: Balanced, Light, and Social. Try Wynk's full family of flavors.

companies.name: Brez
companies.description: BRÄ’Z offers an unparalleled drinking experience. Enjoy a THC drink with a blend of cannabis and Lion's Mane.

companies.name: Nowadays
companies.description: Nowadays offers a variety of THC-infused beverages with different dosages.

companies.name: Flora
companies.description: Beginner or connoisseur, our THC spirits and cocktails are designed to deliver a unique and approachable experience.
